attributes.action: Start using eco-friendly methods of transport to deliver food in city centres
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do it because not only is this saving the environment but it is a smart strategic move because if we can start of small then imagine the greater cause, it will boost revenue as there are a lot of start-up companies that can benefit from this move.
attributes.background: introduce a law that stops takeaways and restaurants from using cars and mopeds as a means of delivering food within a radius to the town center. Pollution is damaging the country and if we start cutting down how much pollution is spread then we are saving the future generation.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for individual councils to take action on.
